title: Leaked Dr. Dre video in 2014 almost put the deal between Apple and Beats in jeopardy
content:
When Apple confirmed that it was acquiring Beats for $3 billion in 2014, the deal became news all over the world. However, Tripp Mickle’s book After Steve has now revealed that the deal between the two companies was almost put in jeopardy after a video of Dr. Dre was leaked on the web.

more…

The post Leaked Dr. Dre video in 2014 almost put the deal between Apple and Beats in jeopardy appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: 'After Steve' book revealed that the deal between Apple and Beats was almost put in jeopardy after a video of Dr. Dre was leaked on the web.
